channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon's base Kindle is $20 off right now
item.description:
The latest entry-level Kindle ereader is on sale for $90 via Amazon. This is a nice discount of $20. It's not a record-low price, but it's certainly a budget-friendly way to keep that New Year's resolution to read more. This made our list of the best ereaders, and for good reason. It's an iconic device that gets the job done. It doesn't have much by way of modern bells and whistles, but it ships with 16GB of storage and comes in two snazzy colorways.
The build is compact and durable. It's also light, which makes it easy to pack and easy to hold up with one hand. It allows access to the vast...

item.title: Clicks is bringing its first smartphone and a new keyboard to CES 2026
item.description: Clicks is bringing its physical keyboard products to CES yet again, and these are chock full of nostalgia. The company has also unveiled its first smartphone, aimed at "communication, not consumption," that it says will function as a second phone used mostly for messaging. The phone is dubbed the Clicks Communicator and features a tactile keyboard, a 4-inch OLED display, a 3.5mm headphone jack and expandable microSD storage up to 2TB. The interface is built on Android 16 and supports hardware-level encryption. Even though Clicks says it wants to leave "content capture" to a users' primary devi...

item.title: How to watch the Hisense CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images Hisense is typically best known for its affordable electronics and home appliances, from TVs to refrigerators. But at CES 2025, the China-based company showed off its premium side with a massive 136-inch micro LED TV — now available for a jaw-dropping $100,000. So what's in store for this year's show? New leadership, for starters. The company has two new hires, including Chief Marketing Officer Sarah Larsen and Chief Commercial Officer James Fishler. In a press release, Hisense said Fishler's experience in home entertainment, appliances and HVAC is important...

item.title: Samsung HW-QS760F : cette barre de son 5.1.2 compatible Dolby Atmos et DTS:X a le droit à une ristourne de 100 €
item.description: S'il y a bien une chose d'intéressante pour un téléviseur, c'est l'ajout d'une barre de son pour avoir un vrai son spatial. Un système 5.1.2 certifié Dolby Atmos ajoutera une plus-value à n'importe quel téléviseur en manque de voix. La Samsung HW-QS760F comporte toutes les fonctions du moment et aussi un prix qui passe de 749 euros à 649 euros chez Boulanger. ...

item.title: Test du Dreame Matrix10 Ultra : Ce robot utilise des serpillières différentes selon les pièces
item.description: Avec le Matrix10 Ultra, Dreame innove grâce à un robot ultra performant capable de commuter automatiquement entre trois jeux de serpillières. Il peut ainsi utiliser des serpillières chaudes pour la plupart des sols et les parquets, d'autres en poils de nylon pour la cuisine, et enfin un troisième jeu absorbant pour les salles d'eau. Dans ce test complet, voyons si cette approche est vraiment efficace par rapport aux robots laveurs classiques. ...

item.title: The ‘Super Flu’ Is Hitting Kids Hard—and Some Aren’t Surviving
item.description: Several states have reported their first pediatric flu deaths this week.

item.description: From home security systems and smart smoke detectors to a sunrise alarm gently that wakes you up, here are the must-have gadgets for living in your first apartment.

item.title: How to watch Awesome Games Done Quick 2026
item.description: It's time for more speedrunning (and other shenanigans) with the Games Done Quick (GDQ) crew. The first event of the year, Awesome Games Done Quick (AGDQ), kicks off on Sunday, January 4, with Super Mario Sunshine. Donations for this year's shindig will benefit the Prevent Cancer Foundation.AGDQ 2026 has a whole week of 24/7 speedruns on tap. You'll see slots for some of 2025's biggest games: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Hollow Knight: Silksong and Hades II are part of the festivities. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater gets both a standard run and a "versus" showdown. There's also plenty of ...

item.title: How to watch the first-ever Lego CES 2026 press conference live
item.description: picture alliance via Getty Images The Lego Group is set to host its very first press conference at CES 2026 — but exactly what it plans to unveil is still under wraps. The iconic toy brick maker has offered no clues about what's on the agenda, leaving speculation wide open, from new video games to Formula 1 race cars. Here's how you can watch Lego's presentation at CES, along with what we think the company could reveal. How to watch The Lego Group's CES 2026 press conference The Lego CES press conference is scheduled for Monday, January 5 at 1PM ET. While Lego and the Consumer Technology Assoc...

item.title: Tips from pharmacists to lower your out-of-pocket drug costs
item.description: Beyond coupons and assistance programs, you can try direct-to-consumer platforms and cash-payment models. Even when Americans have health insurance, they can have a hard time affording the drugs they’ve been prescribed.

item.title: LG made up a new word for its next ultralight Gram laptops: 'Aerominum'
item.description: LG just announced some new Gram AI laptops ahead of CES 2026. These are incredibly portable laptops that the company says are the "lightest in their class." This is largely thanks to a proprietary material that LG has dubbed Aerominum. This material reportedly "reduces the laptop's weight while reinforcing" structural strength. In other words, these computers are both light and durable. Each model offers improved scratch resistance, while providing a "sleek metallic finish." The laptops have also been designed to meet military-grade durability standards. The AI in the name refers to the inclus...

item.title: Tesla loses title as world’s biggest electric carmaker
item.description: Tesla sales have dropped for a second year in row. Tesla lost its crown as the world’s bestselling electric vehicle maker on Friday as a customer revolt over Elon Musk’s right-wing politics, expiring U.S. tax breaks for buyers, and stiff overseas competition pushed sales down for a second year in a row.

item.title: Disney World Employee Injured by Runaway ‘Indiana Jones’ Boulder
item.description: You don't have to be a professor of archaeology to become the victim of a rolling boulder trap these days.

item.title: How to watch the NVIDIA CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: CFOTO via Getty Images During CES 2025, NVIDIA spent much of its keynote touting its leading position in artificial intelligence. Still, the company managed to squeeze in a few notable hardware announcements, including its RTX 5000-series GPUs and Project Digits desktop supercomputer (later redubbed Spark). For this year's show, the company's website says it's "lighting up CES 2026 with the power of AI." To that end, NVIDIA is going big in Las Vegas, promising hands-on demos in its Fontainebleau booth, replete with the "latest NVIDIA solutions driving innovation and productivity across industr...

item.description: The Bluetti Pioneer Na(Sodium) portable power station is on sale for $799, down from the list price of $1,299. That's a 38% discount.

item.title: Pourquoi Starlink va faire descendre plus de 4 000 satellites un peu plus près de la Terre
item.description: Starlink va abaisser l'orbite de plus de 4 000 satellites dans une « reconfiguration significative » de sa constellation. Il s'agit d'améliorer la sécurité spatiale à l'approche d'un événement solaire.

item.title: Le prix de la TCL NxtPaper 11 Plus, dont l’écran imite le papier, s’allège de 25 % sur Amazon
item.description: Avec son écran qui peut basculer vers des modes « papier » comme sur une liseuse, la TCL NxtPaper 11 Plus est une tablette idéale pour les amateurs de BD, mangas et autres romans graphiques. Actuellement, Amazon la propose à 183,75 euros au lieu de 249 euros.

item.title: Monks walk for peace: Route, live tracking map, and what to know about their journey from Texas to D.C.
item.description: With more than a million followers across social platforms, a group of monks and their companion, Aloka the Peace Dog, have captured America’s attention. A group of about 19 Buddhist monks and their rescue dog, Aloka, are walking from Fort Worth, Texas, to Washington, D.C., to promote world peace. Their planned route spans approximately 2,300 miles across 10 states and is expected to take 120 days to complete. ...

item.title: Pour bien débuter 2026, ce TV de Sony noté 8/10 grâce à sa technologie mini-LED s’offre une baisse de plus de 400 euros
item.description: Avec sa dalle 4K de 65 pouces ou le soin apporté au gaming, ce Bravia 5 de Sony possède de nombreuses qualités. Des qualités que vous pourrez découvrir pour un prix de 1 190 euros chez Son-Vidéo.com, contre 1 599 euros de base.
